derivation.yuyuan_name: Second World War (originally RAF slang): perhaps referring to Burton ale, from Burton-upon-Trent
early 18th cent.: alteration of Middle English  Breton tackle, a nautical term of the same sense (see Breton)

means.word_mean: 1. English explorer who with John Speke was the first European to explore Lake Tanganyika (1821-1890)
2. Welsh film actor who often co-starred with Elizabeth Taylor (1925-1984)
